name: 36V (18V X2) LXT® Brushless 21" Self‑Propelled Commercial Lawn Mower Kit with 4 Batteries (5.0Ah)
description: Cuts up to 2/3 acre in 60 minutes or less with (4) 18V LXT® 5.0 Ah batteries. 4 bay battery system for 2 times more run time. Commercial-grade steel deck. Self-propelled with variable speed lever (1.5 MPH - 3 MPH). 4 ea. 18V LXT® 5.0Ah batteries and dual port rapid charger

name: 18V LXT® Lithium‑Ion Brushless Cordless Blower Kit (4.0Ah)
description: Makita-built BL™ Brushless Motor delivers up to 459 CFM and 116 MPH.  Cruise control lever with variable speed trigger for power and run time management. In-line fan design provides better tool balance and improved ergonomics. Rubberized soft grip provides increased comfort on the job.

name: 36V (18V X2) LXT® Brushless 16" Chain Saw Kit (4.0Ah)
description: Makita-built outer rotor brushless motor direct-drive system delivers power of a 32cc gas chain saw. "Tool-less" chain adjustment for convenient operation and maintenance. Variable speed trigger and high chain speed (0-3,940 FPM) for improved cutting performance.
